product_name: Core Concepts Whiskey River Hybrid Shirt - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Go ahead, wear the Core Concepts Whiskey RIver Hybrid shirt from the mountain to the pub. The retro-styled shirt offers protection on the outside and comfort on the inside. Soft, nylon face resists wind and water, yet maintains breathability for comfort in warm weather; it's bonded to a lightweight polyester lining that wicks sweat and breathes. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. The Core Concepts Whiskey RIver Hybrid shirt features Western-inspired pearl-face snaps; dual snaps at cuffs; 2 chest pockets. Overstock.
short_description: Go ahead, wear the Core Concepts Whiskey RIver Hybrid shirt from the mountain to the pub. The retro-styled shirt offers protection on the outside and comfort on the inside.
